body:
Comment 3: 
that benchmark is special, it is taken from shoutout benchmark game.
(if you dig into it a little, you will find other benchmarks that use gmp and pcre)

if fact, before rev f33da81baac2, we silently use glib-2.0 by providing default compiler
flags,
as I've said, that will break on machines where doesn't install glib-2.0 to the default
path.

the shoutout benchmarks are not mandatory, so any compilation failures could be ignored.
maybe we just need to mention that in doc/install/source? or better, just echo:
please ignore any errors/warnings produced here.
before ./timing.sh -test in run.bash?
